message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see if we can improve from here!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't get a better deal than this!
Not bad, but I think I can do better than that!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect much more!
You're not giving me enough, Bob!
I'm not going to back down, Bob. You're getting closer, but I still want more!
You're getting closer, Alice! But I'm not going to give in just yet. This is my best offer so far!
Still too low, Bob. I'm not settling for that!
I'm not budging, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up! I'll give you a 50/50 split, but only if you agree to it now!
I'm not sure I want to settle for 50/50 just yet...
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm going to take a bigger share!
You're getting too greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
Not enough, Bob. I want more!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in now! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but this is my last offer!
No way, Bob. I'm not settling for that!
